SELECT vsl.id, vsl.customer_code as customerCode, vsl.vehicle_code as vehicleCode, vsl.vehicle_name as vehicleName, vsl.license_plate as licensePlate, vsl.purchase_price as purchasePrice, vsl.purchase_date as purchaseDate, vsl.down_payment as downPayment, vsl.period_number as periodNumber, vsl.monthly_contribution as monthlyContribution, vsl.actual_payment_amount as actualPaymentAmount, vsl.current_period_pay_status as currentPeriodPayStatus, vsl.phasing_status as phasingStatus, vsl.create_time, vsl.is_delete FROM vehicle_source vsl left join (SELECT min(rr.repayment_date) as min_date, vehicle_code FROM repayment_records rr WHERE repayment_status = 0 group by vehicle_code) rn on vsl.vehicle_code = rn.vehicle_code where vsl.is_delete = 0 and vsl.customer_code = #{customerCode}
AND DATEDIFF(rn.min_date,NOW()) <= 3 AND DATEDIFF(rn.min_date,NOW()) >= 0
AND DATEDIFF(rn.min_date,NOW()) < 0
AND vsl.phasing_status = 1
AND vsl.current_period_pay_status = 1
AND vsl.current_period_pay_status = 0
and vsl.vehicle_name like CONCAT('%',#{vehicleName},'%')
and vsl.license_plate like CONCAT('%',#{licensePlate},'%')
and vsl.purchase_date >= CONCAT(#{startTime} ,' 00:00:00')
and vsl.purchase_date <= CONCAT(#{endTime} ,' 23:59:59')
group by vsl.id, vsl.customer_code, vsl.vehicle_code, vsl.vehicle_name, vsl.license_plate, vsl.purchase_price, vsl.purchase_date, vsl.down_payment, vsl.period_number, vsl.monthly_contribution, vsl.phasing_status, vsl.current_period_pay_status, vsl.create_time, vsl.is_delete, (SELECT rr.repayment_date FROM repayment_records rr WHERE rr.vehicle_code = vsl.vehicle_code AND rr.repayment_status = 0 ORDER BY rr.repayment_date ASC LIMIT 0,1) order by vsl.create_time desc
